name: Melancholic Ange;
description:
Melancholy Ange; is a small platform puzzle game, with unique art style, challenging puzzles, and lovable character. You'll play as Elie, a non-winged angel wanting to meet her friend, to do that, she'll need to collect pieces of wings slipped inside deep dark dungeons; there would be a lot of twists of of scenarios along the way and dangerous, brain teasing puzzles inside. You'll need to help her through to fulfill her small dream.

but falther not, as the faint lights and her great will would guide you along the way..
